content: Hi I am trying to download python for lean. I tried to install python 3.11.0. While opening the exe file to install python it showed me the option "Add python.exe to the PATH" and I installed after which I typed the command "which python" on git bash which did not show the correct directory format as expected. Instead I already have python 3.10 in my system. So what should I do to proceed further
This is a thread about workspaces not working in Lean 4. If you're asking about Lean 3 and python problems you should start a new thread in this stream with an appropriate title.
2 messages were moved here from #new members > Lean4: Workspace not trusted in VS Code by Anne Baanen.

Srikrishna Sampath Kumaran said:

Instead I already have python 3.10 in my system. So what should I do to proceed further

We test the leanproject command with all Python versions starting from 3.6, so Python 3.10 should work fine. Did you already try out running leanproject?
